resources.string: Uncover all boxes except those containing items. When you click on a box, a number appears telling you how many objects there are around it. Be careful because if you click on a square that has a hidden object, you will lose. If you believe or are certain that there is an object, long click on the box to highlight it. Do not make a long click on a square where there is no object because you will lose. You win once you have found all the objects.
